channel.title: Ip Bannning? HELP!
channel.description:
Okay Guess i need help i need to banned Ip's Well i opened my Data folder and went to Bannedips tossed the ip in and they still log in with the same Ip how is that, i even banned their names and one still manges to logg in same account? What now They were trying to take over my server, cause they thought i had no files.
But i do need help fast!.....
This si the Ip....Looks funky can it be a proxy??
d220-236-193-248.dsl.nsw.optusnet.com.au
may want to ban it on yours also to keep it away from being hacked.

item.title: Ip Bannning? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Use the IPBAN command,
type ::banip or ::ipban ,
If that doesnt work, u dont have the ipban command,
then you can go to ‘LOGS’ and then to ‘IPBANLOGS’
add the ip, to it, close, ban/kick the player, and he try to login, cant;)

Read full topic

item.title: Ip Bannning? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Dynamik Dynamik
item.description:
@Dynamik wrote:

If your using project czar your ip ban wont work, you have to add it yourself.
You have to add a code that checks for the ip and if it is a certain ip, it would disconnect it.
Something along the lines of, if connecthost.startswith(127.0.0.1) { disconnected = true;}

Read full topic
